```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

food = 
rest_inspec %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na() %>% 
  sample_n(5000)
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
food %>%
  group_by(camis, boro, score) %>%
  filter(cuisine_description == "Pizza") %>%
  count(action) %>%
  #mutate(text_label = str_c('Grade: ', grade)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~score, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", color = ~boro, alpha = 0.5)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
food %>%  
  filter(cuisine_description %in% c("Brazilian", "Portugese", "American", "Creole", "Greek", "Indian", "Italian", "Japanese", "Thai", "Iranian")) %>%
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, score)) %>% 
 plot_ly(y = ~score, color = ~cuisine_description, type = "box",
          colors = "Set2")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
food %>%  
  filter(critical_flag == "Critical") %>%
  group_by(boro) %>%
  count(critical_flag) %>% 
  #mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, n)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~n, color = ~boro, type = "bar")
```
